summary.span: 表示 的参数，还可以表示它到 的映射。

span.span: Represents a parameter to an and optionally, its mapping to a .

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数名称不区分大小写。Parameter names are not case sensitive. 使用 Oracle 的 Microsoft OLE DB 提供程序 (MSDAORA) 和 ODBC .NET Framework 数据提供程序查询 Oracle 数据库时, 如果使用`LIKE`子句来查询固定长度字段中的值, 则可能不会返回所有所需的匹配项。When querying an Oracle database using the Microsoft OLE DB Provider for Oracle (MSDAORA) and the ODBC .NET Framework Data Provider, using the `LIKE` clause to query values in fixed-length fields might not return all expected matches. 原因在于, 当 Oracle 在`LIKE`子句中匹配固定长度字段的值时, 它会与字符串的整个长度匹配, 其中包括任何空白尾随空格。The reason is that when Oracle matches values for fixed-length fields in a `LIKE` clause, it matches the entire length of the string, including any padding trailing spaces. 例如, 如果 Oracle 数据库中的某个表包含一个名为 "Field1" 的字段 (定义为`char(3)`), 并且您在该表的行中输入值 "a", 则下面的代码不会返回该行。For example, if a table in an Oracle database contains a field named "Field1" that is defined as `char(3)`, and you enter the value "a" into a row of that table, the following code will not return the row. ```vb Dim queryString As String = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?" Dim command As OleDbCommand = New OleDbCommand(queryString, connection) command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a" Dim reader As OleDbDataReader = command.ExecuteReader() ``` ```csharp string queryString = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?"; OleDbCommand command = new OleDbCommand(queryString, connection); command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a"; OleDbDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); ``` 这是因为 oracle 将列值存储为 "a" (填充 "a", 尾随空格, 固定字段长度为 3), 在进行固定长度的字段`LIKE`比较时, oracle 不会将其视为 "a" 参数值的匹配项。This is because Oracle stores the column value as "a " (padding "a", with trailing spaces, to the fixed field length of 3), which Oracle does not treat as a match for the parameter value of "a" in the case of a `LIKE` comparison of fixed-length fields. 若要解决此问题, 请将一个百分比 ("%") 通配符追加到参数值`"a%"`(), 或改为`=`使用 SQL 比较。To resolve this problem, append a percentage ("%") wildcard character to the parameter value (`"a%"`), or use an SQL `=` comparison instead. ## Examples 下面的示例在 中通过创建多个的实例。The following example creates multiple instances of through the within the . 这些参数用于从数据源中选择数据, 并将数据放入中。These parameters are used to select data from the data source and place the data in the . 此示例假设已使用相应的架构、命令和连接创建了一个和。This example assumes that a and an have already been created by using the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcParameter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcParameter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数的此重载来指定整数参数值时, 请务必小心。Use caution when you are using this overload of the constructor to specify integer parameter values. 因为此重载接受 类型的 `value`，所以当此值为零时，必须将整数值转换为 类型，如下面的 C# 示例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` Parameter = new OdbcParameter("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` 如果不执行此转换, 编译器将假定您尝试调用构造函数重载。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler assumes that you are trying to call the constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 , 并显示。The following example creates an and displays the . ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 11, ParameterDirection.Output, True, 0, 0, "Description", DataRowVersion.Current, False, "garden hose") MessageBox.Show(parameter.ToString()) End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Description",OdbcType.VarChar, 11,ParameterDirection.Output,true,0,0,"Description", DataRowVersion.Current, false, "garden hose"); MessageBox.Show(parameter.ToString()); } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和已链接。The and are linked. 因此, 将 更改设置为支持。Therefore, setting the changes the to a supporting . 有关支持的数据类型的列表, 请参阅相应成员。For a list of the supported data types, see the appropriate member. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md). > [!NOTE] > 适用于 ODBC 的 Microsoft .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持。 is not supported by the Microsoft .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 ODBC 托管提供程序调用带有三个参数的**存储过程**。The following example calls a **Stored Procedure** with three parameters using the ODBC managed provider. summary.span: 获取或设置 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .
The name of the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks ODBC .NET 提供程序在命令文本的语法中使用问号 (？) 标记的位置参数, 而不是命名参数。Instead of named parameters, the ODBC .NET Provider uses positional parameters that are marked with a question mark (?) in the syntax of the command text. 中的参数对象和存储过程或参数化 SQL 语句所接受的实际参数根据对象插入到集合中的顺序彼此对应, 而不是相对于参数名称。Parameter objects in the and the actual parameters accepted by the stored procedure or parameterized SQL statement correspond to each other based on the order in which the objects are inserted into the collection instead of by parameter name. 可以提供参数名, 但在参数对象绑定期间将被忽略。Parameter names can be supplied, but will be ignored during parameter object binding. ## Examples 下面的示例假定数据源具有表名称**MyTable**和名为 MyProc 的存储过程, 并将其定义为:The following example assumes that the data source has a table name **MyTable** and a stored procedure named MyProc that is defined as: ``` CREATE TABLE MyTable (col1 int, col2 smallmoney, col3 decimal) CREATE PROC MyProc (@p1 int, @p2 smallmoney, @p3 decimal) AS INSERT INTO MyTable VALUES (@p1, @p2, @p3) ``` 下面的示例创建参数并调用 MyProc 存储过程:The following example creates parameters and calls the MyProc stored procedure: ```vb Public Sub CreateMyProc(connection As OdbcConnection) Dim command As OdbcCommand = connection.CreateCommand() command.CommandText = "{ call MyProc(?,?,?) }" command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Int).Value = 1 command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Decimal).Value = 2 command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Decimal).Value = 3 End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateMyProc(OdbcConnection connection) { OdbcCommand command = myConnection.CreateCommand(); command.CommandText = "{ call MyProc(?,?,?) }"; command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Int).Value = 1; command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Decimal).Value = 2; command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Decimal).Value = 3; } ```

span.span: Working with Commands

MemberSignature.Value: public byte Precision { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8 Precision
Public Property Precision As Byte
public: property System::Byte Precision { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.Precision : byte with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用来表示 属性的最大位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of digits used to represent the property.

value.span: 用于表示 属性的最大位数。

span.span: The maximum number of digits used to represent the property.

value.span: 默认值为 0，它表示数据提供程序设置 的精度。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that the data provider sets the precision for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为数据库中的值以外的值, 则将取决于数据访问接口的实现, 并且可能会返回错误代码、截断或舍入数据。Setting this property to a value other than the value in the database depends on the implementation of the data provider and may return an error code, truncate, or round data. 此属性仅影响为`Decimal`或`Numeric`的参数。The property only affects parameters whose is `Decimal` or `Numeric`. 对于其他数据类型, 将被忽略。For other data types, is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 不支持使用此属性来强制传递到数据库的数据。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. 若要在将数据传递到数据库之前对其进行舍入、截断或强制转换, 请使用`System`命名空间中的类, 然后将值分配给该`Value`参数的属性。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Price", OdbcType.Decimal) parameter.Value = 3.1416 parameter.Precision = 8 parameter.Scale = 4 End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Price", OdbcType.Decimal); parameter.Value = 3.1416; parameter.Precision = 8; parameter.Scale = 4; } ```

summary.span: 重置与此 关联的类型。

span.span: Resets the type associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当执行包含参数值的命令时, 代码可以显式设置参数的类型, 或者该参数可以从其值推断其类型。When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value. 调用此方法将重置参数, 使其可以再次从参数中传递的值推断其类型。Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter. 调用此方法会影响的和属性。 Calling this method affects both the and properties of the . 调用将重置为其默认值 (String)。Calling resets to its default value (String).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当执行包含参数值的命令时, 代码可以显式设置参数的类型, 或者该参数可以从其值推断其类型。When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value. 调用此方法将重置参数, 使其可以再次从参数中传递的值推断其类型。Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter. 调用此方法会影响的和属性。 Calling this method affects both the and properties of the .

MemberSignature.Value: public byte Scale { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8 Scale
Public Property Scale As Byte
public: property System::Byte Scale { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.Scale : byte with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置所解析的 的小数位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to which is resolved.

value.span: 所解析的 的小数位数。

span.span: The number of decimal places to which is resolved.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅用于 decimal 和 numeric 输入参数。The property is used only for decimal and numeric input parameters. 将此属性设置为数据库中的值以外的值的效果取决于数据访问接口的实现, 并且可能会返回错误代码, 或者截断或舍入数据。The effect of setting this property to a value other than the value in the database depends on the implementation of the data provider and may return an error code, or truncate or round data. 此属性仅影响为`Decimal`或`Numeric`的参数。The property only affects parameters whose is `Decimal` or `Numeric`. 对于其他数据类型, 将被忽略。For other data types, is ignored. 使用 SQL Server Native Client 10 (或更高版本) 绑定其类型为 Decimal、Numeric、VarNumeric、为 dbdate 或 DBTimeStamp 的参数时, 必须手动指定适当的缩放值。When using SQL Server Native Client 10 (or later) to bind a parameter whose type is Decimal, Numeric, VarNumeric, DBDate, or DBTimeStamp, you must manually specify an appropriate Scale value. > [!NOTE] > 不支持使用此属性来强制传递到数据库的数据。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. 若要在将数据传递到数据库之前对其进行舍入、截断或强制转换, 请使用`System`命名空间中的类, 然后将值分配给该`Value`参数的属性。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 版本1.0 附带 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不验证`scale`参数值的。 .NET Framework data providers that are included with the .NET Framework version 1.0 do not verify the `scale` of parameter values. 这可能会导致在数据源中插入修改后的数据。This can cause modified data being inserted at the data source. 如果使用 .NET Framework 版本 1.0, 请在设置参数`scale`值`decimal`之前验证值。If you are using .NET Framework version 1.0, validate the `scale` of `decimal` values before setting the parameter value. 当你使用 .NET Framework 版本1.1 或更高版本`scale`时, `decimal`超出参数范围的值可能仅会在缩放时被截断 (如果这是基础 ODBC 驱动程序的行为)。When you use .NET Framework version 1.1 or later versions, `scale` values that exceed the `decimal` parameter scale might only be truncated in scale, if that is the behavior of the underlying ODBC driver. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Price", OdbcType.Decimal) parameter.Value = 3.1416 parameter.Precision = 8 parameter.Scale = 4 End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Price", OdbcType.Decimal); parameter.Value = 3.1416; parameter.Precision = 8; parameter.Scale = 4; } ```

span.span: Working with Commands

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Size { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Size
Public Overrides Property Size As Integer
public: virtual property int Size { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Size : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置列内数据的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the data within the column.
The maximum size of the data within the column.

value.span: 默认值将根据参数值进行推断。

span.span: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于二进制和字符串类型。The property is used for binary and string types. 对于非字符串数据类型和 ANSI 字符串数据, 属性是指字节数。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. 对于 Unicode 字符串数据, 是指字符数。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字符串的计数不包括终止字符。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 对于可变长度数据类型, `Size`描述要传输到服务器的最大数据量。For variable-length data types, `Size` describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如, 对于 Unicode 字符串值, `Size`可用于将发送到服务器的数据量限制为前100个字符。For example, for a Unicode string value, `Size` could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 对于双向参数、输出参数和返回值, 必须设置的值`Size`。For bidirectional and output parameters, and return values, you must set the value of `Size`. 这不是输入参数所必需的, 如果未显式设置, 则执行参数化语句时, 的值将从指定参数的实际大小推断。This is not required for input parameters, and if not explicitly set, the value of is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter when a parameterized statement is executed. 可以通过 设置来推断参数的、和属性。The , , and properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting . 因此, 您不需要指定它们。Therefore, you are not required to specify them. 但是, 它们不会在属性设置中公开。However, they are not exposed in property settings. 例如, 如果已推断出参数的大小, `Size`则不会在语句执行后包含推断值。For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, `Size` does not contain inferred value after statement execution. > [!NOTE] > `ParameterDirection.Output` `Size`对于具有、`ParameterDirection.InputOutput`或 的,如果数据源返回的值的大小超过了指定的,则在执行命令时将引发异常。`ParameterDirection.ReturnValue` `OdbcParameter` .For an `OdbcParameter` with a of `ParameterDirection.Output`, `ParameterDirection.InputOutput`, or `ParameterDirection.ReturnValue`, an exception is thrown when the command is executed if the size of the value returned by the data source exceeds the specified `Size` of the . 对于固定长度的数据类型, 将忽略的`Size`值。For fixed-length data types, the value of `Size` is ignored. 可以检索它以提供信息, 并返回将参数值传输到服务器时提供程序使用的最大字节数。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim myValue As String = "12 foot scarf - multiple colors, one previous owner" Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar) parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output parameter.Size = myValue.Length parameter.Value = myValue End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { string myValue = "12 foot scarf - multiple colors, one previous owner"; OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar); parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; parameter.Size = myValue.Length; parameter.Value = myValue; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SourceColumn { get; set; }
.property instance string SourceColumn
Public Overrides Property SourceColumn As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SourceColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SourceColumn : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置源列的名称，该源列映射到 并用于加载或返回 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the and used for loading or returning the .

value.span: 将用于设置此参数值的源列的名称。

span.span: The name of the source column that will be used to set the value of this parameter.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将设置为空字符串以外的任何值, 则会从`SourceColumn`名称为的列中检索参数的值。When is set to anything other than an empty string, the value of the parameter is retrieved from the column with the `SourceColumn` name. 如果设置为`Input`, 则从中获取值。If is set to `Input`, the value is taken from the . 如果`Direction`设置为`Output`, 则从数据源中获取值。If `Direction` is set to `Output`, the value is taken from the data source. `Direction` 的`InputOutput`是两者的组合。A `Direction` of `InputOutput` is a combination of both. 有关如何使用属性的详细信息, 请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)和[使用 dataadapter 更新数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 88) parameter.SourceColumn = "Description" End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 88); parameter.SourceColumn = "Description"; } ```

member this.SourceColumnNullMapping : bool with get, set

summary.span: 设置或获取一个值，该值指示源列是否可以为 null。

span.span: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: 这使 能够正确地为可为 null 的列生成 Update 语句。

span.span: This lets correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果源列可以为 null，则为 ；如果不可以为 null，则为 。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处理可以为 null 的列时, 将使用来正确生成更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 通常, 使用仅限于从继承的开发人员。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用此属性来确定源列是否可以为 null, 如果此属性为 null `true` `false` , 则将其设置为, 如果不是, 则将此属性设置为。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 当生成其 Update 语句时, 它会检查每个参数的。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果属性为`true`, 则生成一个 WHERE 子句, 如下面的示例所示。If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following example. 在此查询表达式中, "FieldName" 表示字段的名称:In this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field: ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果字段为 false, 则生成以下 WHERE 子句:If for the field is false, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 此外, @IsNull_FieldName如果源字段包含 null, 则包含 1, 如果不包含 null, 则包含0。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 此机制允许在 SQL Server 中进行性能优化, 并提供适用于跨多个提供程序的通用代码。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object Value { get; set; }
.property instance object Value
Public Overrides Property Value As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Value : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于输入参数, 值将绑定到发送到服务器的。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 对于输出和返回值参数, 值在完成 时设置, 在关闭之后。For output and return-value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 向服务器发送空参数值时, 用户必须指定, 而不是 null。When you send a null parameter value to the server, the user must specify , not null. 系统中的 null 值是没有值的空对象。A null value in the system is an empty object that has no value. 用于表示 null 值。 is used to represent null values. 如果使用参数调用带有具有默认值的参数的存储过程, 则将设置为 null 会导致使用默认值。If the parameter is used to call a stored procedure with parameters that have default values, setting to null causes the default value to be used. 如果应用程序指定了数据库类型, 则当提供程序将数据发送到服务器时, 绑定值将转换为该类型。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 如果提供程序支持接口, 则会尝试转换任何类型的值。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的类型与值不兼容, 则可能会导致转换错误。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 和属性都可以通过设置来推断。 Both the and properties can be inferred by setting . 如果适用, 则在执行参数化语句时, 还会从中推断大小、精度和小数位数。If applicable, the size, precision, and scale is also inferred from when the parameterized statement is executed. 但是, 不向用户公开推断值。However, inferred values are not exposed to the user. 此属性被`Update`方法覆盖。The property is overwritten by the `Update` method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 88) parameter.Value = "garden hose" End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 88); parameter.Value = "garden hose"; } ```

span.span: Working with Commands
